page.title: 03HEALTH
page.content: BRANDESBURTON HOSPITAL The hospital is a Psychiatric Hospital.It was originally the Manor House and was owned by the Harrison family. There are about 300 patients in the hospital which provides long term care. Various support services exist in the daily life such as Speach Therapy and Occupational Therapy. The patients are under the care of full and part time staff as well as being patients of the local doctors. SURGERY The nearest surgery to Brandesburton is at Leven, approximately 3 miles away. This is a group practice with four doctors and a nurse also in attendance. A mini-bus tours round to carry patients to and from the surgery.
